full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical

#### Solicitation Number
W8482-241641/A

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence seeks bids for the procurement of special purpose electrical cable assemblies.

#### Items Required
There are six items listed in the tender package, each with distinct specifications and requirements:

* Item 1: Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical (7 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax)
* Item 2: Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical (15 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt)
* Item 3: Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical (7 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax)
* Item 4: Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical (15 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt)
* Item 5: Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical (9 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax)
* Item 6: Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical (10 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt)

#### Bidder Requirements
Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.

#### Language of Documents
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

#### Contact Information
Johan Vizcaya Collado
Email: [johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca](mailto:johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 576-4914

#### Supporting Documents
Refer to the tender package for detailed specifications and requirements.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be the primary evaluation criterion.

#### Closing Date
Tenders must be received by July 14, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.

#### Amendment and Tender Notice
This tender package includes an amendment and notice of tender opportunity.

### Tender Details

* **UNSPSC**: 26121700
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Confidentiality and Security

* All technical information and documentation submitted as part of this tender opportunity are confidential.
